title: Hysteresis Control Logic
description: F_TO_C converts a temperature reading from Fahrenheit in Celsius.
name: HYST_2

input.name: IN
input.description: The input value to be evaluated against the hysteresis conditions.

input.name: VAL
input.description: The reference value from which hysteresis is calculated.

input.name: HYS
input.description: The amount of hysteresis used to determine the output states.

output.name: Q
output.description: The boolean output indicating if the input is above the upper hysteresis threshold.

output.name: WIN
output.description: The boolean output indicating if the input is within the hysteresis window.
